title: Content Management System
content: A simple CMS built with Node.js, Express and EJS — focused on clarity and speed. Built for speed and clarity. Customize quickly and deploy with confidence.

title: About My CMS
content: Welcome to My CMS, a lightweight content management system designed for simplicity, speed, and complete control. Built with Express and EJS, our CMS allows you to manage content efficiently without unnecessary complexity. Whether you’re running a small project, an internal dashboard, or just exploring web development, this system gives you a solid foundation to organize and present your content.

title: Simplicity
content: Intuitive navigation and clean design for a smooth user experience.

title: Customization
content: Easy to adapt to your unique workflow or branding.

title: Learning
content: Perfect for developers who want to understand how a CMS works from the ground up.

title: Get in touch
content: Have a question or want to collaborate? Send us a message and we'll respond shortly.
